{{wikipedia|Fengkai County}}
===Etymology===
A compound of the names of [[Fengchuan]] ([[封川]], "[[seal|Seal]]ed [[river|River]]") and [[Kaijian]] ([[開建]], "[[open|Opening]] [[establishment|Establishment]]"), the two counties whose 1961 merger created the present county.
